casebody.data:
GLOBE INDEMNITY COMPANY, A CORPORATION, PETITIONER, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 44900]

[Ante, p. 21; 324 U. S. —]

Government contract; changes ordered by the contracting officer not approved by the head of department as required by articles 3 and 4 of the standard construction contract.

Decided May 1, 1944; plaintiff not entitled to recover and petition dismissed. Plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled October 2,1944. Ante, p. 21.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court March 5,1945.
